section.name: Quickstart Steps
section.span: Quickly install and use standard Hippo CMS with example content.
section.p: This quickstart works on all modern, standard computer systems.

subsection.name: Install standard Hippo CMS with example content

tr.td: Download the zipped quickstart package that includes the Jetty application container (if you prefer the tar.gz, take that).
Unzip the downloaded file (name starts with `release after M6.4 (13536)hippo-ecm-quickstart-bin'). A hippo-ecm folder is created.

subsection.name: Using standard Hippo CMS with example content

table.summary: First column= step number, second column= action icon, third column= action description

tr.td:
Open a commandline interface and start the script hippo-ecm/startup.bat (on MS systems) or hippo-ecm/startup.sh (on Unices). The text
INFO: Started SelectChannelConnector@127.0.0.1:8080
indicates Hippo CMS has started. The script will continue running, until you are done. Need Help?
Open http://localhost:8080/cms/ in your (this) webbrowser. A window `Sign In, Hippo CMS 7' will open. As username use `admin' and as password use also `admin'.
Try out the Hippo CMS. Use the CMS User Guide for help.
Quit the Hippo CMS by Ctrl-C in the commandline interface where the startup script is still running. The text INFO: Shutdown hook executing indicates Hippo CMS is shutting down.
